Hymn.Arabic: "  الرب عزٌ لشعبه، وهو موآزر خلاص مسيحه،
Hymn.English: 8 The Lord is their strength, And He is the saving refuge of His anointed.

Hymn.Arabic: خلص شعبك وبارك ميراثك، ارعهم ارفعهم إلى الأبد. هلليلويا "
Hymn.English: 9 Save Your people, And bless Your inheritance; Shepherd them also, And bear them up forever.
